about_the_game: WizardWars.online is a fast paced multiplayer game featuring strategic spell based combat.  Players battle both NPCs and enemy players in short-lived matches.  Progress your wizard, hone your skills, and team up with friends to win in the most magical battle royale title of 2024!
detailed_description: WizardWars.online is a fast paced multiplayer game featuring strategic spell based combat.  Players battle both NPCs and enemy players in short-lived matches.  Progress your wizard, hone your skills, and team up with friends to win in the most magical battle royale title of 2024!
legal_notice: WizardWars.online is under Copyright 2020-2023 Yeti Studios

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later, Fedora 21 or later, Debian 8 or layer
  • Processor: Both intel and arm supported
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Anything that runs Chromium will work.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Both arm and intel supported
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Anything that runs Chromium will work.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Anything that runs Chromium will work.

name: WizardWars.online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and later are supported
  • Processor: Both x86 and amd64 (x64) binaries are supported
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Anything that runs Chrome will work.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Anything that runs Chrome will work.

short_description: WizardWars.online is a fast paced multiplayer game featuring strategic spell based combat. Players battle both NPCs and enemy players in short-lived matches. Progress your wizard, hone your skills, and team up with friends to win in the most magical battle royale title of 2024!
